H3.text: who played ashley on the young and the restless. Shari Shattuck

A4.text: Eileen Davidson portrayed Ashley Abbott from June 11, 1982, until her first exit on December 2, 1988.

A5.text: Shari Shattuck portrayed the role for the next three years, until Davidson's return on March 19, 1999.
